Welcome to Pynuts' documentation!
==================================
    Pynuts is a microframework for Python based on Flask, Jinja 2 and good intentions.

Latest Version: 0.1

Contents:

    :maxdepth: 2

    Installation
    Quickstart
    API
    Tutorial
